targets.queryText:
WITH config AS (SELECT 
    (1000000 * UNIXEPOCH("${CTF_START_DATE}")) AS ctf_start_ts,
    (1000000 * ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}) AS tick_length
)
SELECT
    (ctf_start_ts + cast(((ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length) as int) * tick_length) / 1000000 AS time,
    (ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length as tick,
    COUNT(*) as flows,
    (ctf_start_ts + cast((ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length + 1 as int) * tick_length) as ts_to_url
FROM flow, config
WHERE
    ts_start / 1000 >= $__from and ts_start / 1000 < $__to
GROUP BY cast(((ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / 1000000 / ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}) as int) * ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}
targets.rawQueryText:
WITH config AS (SELECT 
    (1000000 * UNIXEPOCH("${CTF_START_DATE}")) AS ctf_start_ts,
    (1000000 * ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}) AS tick_length
)
SELECT
    (ctf_start_ts + cast(((ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length) as int) * tick_length) / 1000000 AS time,
    (ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length as tick,
    COUNT(*) as flows,
    (ctf_start_ts + cast((ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length + 1 as int) * tick_length) as ts_to_url
FROM flow, config
WHERE
    ts_start / 1000 >= $__from and ts_start / 1000 < $__to
GROUP BY cast(((ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / 1000000 / ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}) as int) * ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}

targets.queryText:
WITH config AS (SELECT 
    (1000000 * UNIXEPOCH("${CTF_START_DATE}")) AS ctf_start_ts,
    (1000000 * ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}) AS tick_length
)
SELECT
    (ctf_start_ts + cast(((ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length) as int) * tick_length) / 1000000 AS time,
    (ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length as tick,
    COUNT(*) as flag_out,
    (ctf_start_ts + cast((ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length + 1 as int) * tick_length) as ts_to_url
FROM flow, config
WHERE
    ts_start / 1000 >= $__from and ts_start / 1000 < $__to
    AND id IN (SELECT flow_id FROM alert WHERE tag = "FLAG OUT")
GROUP BY cast(((ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / 1000000 / ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}) as int) * ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}

targets.queryText:
WITH config AS (SELECT 
    (1000000 * UNIXEPOCH("${CTF_START_DATE}")) AS ctf_start_ts,
    (1000000 * ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}) AS tick_length
)
SELECT
    ts_start / 1000000 AS time,
    concat('tick=', (ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length, ' ', metadata->>'$.flowvars[0].match') AS text
FROM flow, config
WHERE
    ts_start / 1000 >= $__from and ts_start / 1000 < $__to
    AND metadata->>'$.flowvars[0].match' IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY ts_start DESC
LIMIT 1000
targets.rawQueryText:
WITH config AS (SELECT 
    (1000000 * UNIXEPOCH("${CTF_START_DATE}")) AS ctf_start_ts,
    (1000000 * ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}) AS tick_length
)
SELECT
    ts_start / 1000000 AS time,
    concat('tick=', (ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length, ' ', metadata->>'$.flowvars[0].match') AS text
FROM flow, config
WHERE
    ts_start / 1000 >= $__from and ts_start / 1000 < $__to
    AND metadata->>'$.flowvars[0].match' IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY ts_start DESC
LIMIT 1000

targets.queryText:
WITH config AS (SELECT 
    (1000000 * UNIXEPOCH("${CTF_START_DATE}")) AS ctf_start_ts,
    (1000000 * ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}) AS tick_length
)
SELECT
    (ctf_start_ts + cast(((ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length) as int) * tick_length) / 1000000 AS time,
    (ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length as tick,
    COUNT(*) as flows,
    (ctf_start_ts + cast((ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / tick_length + 1 as int) * tick_length) as ts_to_url
FROM flow, config
WHERE
    ts_start / 1000 >= $__from and ts_start / 1000 < $__to
    AND (CONCAT(src_ip, ':', src_port) == "${CTF_SERVICES:value}" OR CONCAT(dest_ip, ':', dest_port) == "${CTF_SERVICES:value}")
GROUP BY cast(((ts_start - ctf_start_ts) / 1000000 / ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}) as int) * ${CTF_TICK_LENGTH}
targets.rawQueryText:

WHERE

list.description: CTF start date as configured in .env file
list.label: Start date
list.name: CTF_START_DATE

list.description: CTF tick length (in seconds) as configured in .env file
list.label: Tick length
list.name: CTF_TICK_LENGTH

list.description: Filter by services, as defined in .env
list.label: Services
list.name: CTF_SERVICES
